name: THE OLD FASHIONED
ingredient_notes: Bulleit bourbon provides a robust base with notes of oak, vanilla, and a hint of spice.
Maraschino cherry offers a touch of sweetness and a bright, fruity undertone.
Orange peel adds a zesty citrus aroma and a subtle bitterness that complements the bourbon.
Sugar balances the bitterness from the orange peel and Angostura bitters, and adds a smooth, sweet finish.
Angostura bitters contribute complexity with their herbaceous and slightly bitter flavor profile.
tasting_notes: The Old Fashioned is a classic cocktail that delivers warmth from the bourbon, enhanced by the subtle sweetness of the maraschino cherry and the rich aromatic bitterness of the Angostura bitters.
The addition of the orange peel infuses a citrusy brightness that ties the drink's flavors together, while the sugar smooths out the edges for a well-rounded sipping experience.
Served in a rocks glass, it's a cocktail that invites lingering appreciation, with a deep amber color that hints at its storied past and robust character.

name: SMOKED FASHIONED
ingredient_notes: Bulleit bourbon brings a bold, spicy character with hints of maple and nutmeg.
Maraschino cherry provides a hint of sweetness and a bright, fruity note to complement the bourbon.
Orange peel adds a citrusy aroma and a delicate bitterness that enhances the overall complexity of the cocktail.
Sugar balances the spirits and bitters, contributing to a smoother mouthfeel.
Angostura bitters offer a layer of spice and depth, with subtle herbal undertones.
tasting_notes: On the nose, the Smoked Fashioned offers a rich symphony of smoky, woody aromas intertwined with subtle citrus and cherry hints.
The first sip reveals a robust bourbon flavor profile with a pleasant sweetness from the maraschino cherry.
The sugar provides a smooth texture, while the Angostura bitters introduce a layer of complex spiciness that lingers on the palate.
The smokiness from the smoked glass adds a unique cowboy kick, leaving an enduring, warm finish reminiscent of a fireside gathering.

name: SAZERAC
ingredient_notes: Bulleit Rye whiskey brings a bold, spicy character with undertones of vanilla and oak.
Absinthe adds a complex herbal anise flavor with a hint of bitterness.
Peychaud bitters contribute a unique, slightly sweet and floral aroma with light spiciness.
Lemon peel provides a refreshing, citrusy zing that cuts through and balances the sweetness.
Sugar adds sweetness that complements the whiskey and balances the bitterness of the bitters and absinthe.
tasting_notes: On the palate, the SAZERAC delivers a complex interplay of spiciness from the rye whiskey and a subtle herbal bitterness from the absinthe.
The sweetness of the sugar is well-tempered by the citrus oils from the lemon peel, providing a rounded and nuanced sip.
The cocktail has a smooth mouthfeel with an aromatic and warm aftertaste that lingers pleasantly, featuring the oak and vanilla notes of the whiskey.
